mode.recipes.intro: Recipe mode activated. Tell me what ingredients you have!

mode.help.text:
Here‚Äôs what I can do:

Use /start anytime to open the menu again.
menu.language.title: Choose your language
lang.other.title: Other languages
lang.other.prompt: Type a greeting (e.g., ‚ÄúHello/Bonjour/Hola/Ciao/Hallo‚Äù) in your language. I‚Äôll detect it and switch.
